StructuredXMLResume.ExecutiveSummary: • Seasoned IT professional with 10 years of comprehensive Technical, Managerial, and Business skill sets • Hands-on experience as an Individual contributor / full-stack developer (60-80%) and 20-40% as a Techno Manager • Expertise in Cloud apps, Agile, Scrum, Project Estimation/Budgeting, and SaaS (Software as a Service) development • Managed teams with more than 20 members from cross-platforms viz. front-end, back-end, Android, iPhone, QA, etc • Worked for both, the Product based and Outsourcing companies on multiple technology stacks/frameworks • Highly skilled in R&D (any technology/framework), Full Stack Development, Manual Testing, POCs, and MVPs • Practical exposure to Hybrid Mobile apps development, and IoT/IIoT software integration/development • Managed multiple clients, projects, teams and Single point of Contact for clients from USA, UK, Australia, Canada, etc. • Experience of reporting to and working closely with the higher management and directors • Proficient problem-solver who envisions business and technical perspectives to develop workable solutions • Technical Architect and active member of the entire SDLC life cycle processes • Perform code review, version control, deployment; recruitment, training; and give post-release support to clients • Organize and conduct technical sessions/seminars on latest technologies and/or project scope • Industries served: Real-estate, Logistics, ERP, eCommerce, eLearning, IoT/IIoT, Healthcare, Social Network, etc.

PositionHistory.Title: Code review, mentor
PositionHistory.Description:
Hyderabad Duration and Team Size From June 2018 to till date (12+ months with 4 team members) Project Description OLA is a co-living app that manages tenant and vendor services from across multiple buildings/apartments. Some of the services offered and managed are housekeeping, Ollie social, payment management, maintenance requests, etc.
Technologies Amazon Cloud services like (IAM, Lambda, Cognito, CloudWatch, SNS, S3, RDS, VPC, etc), Node.js, MySQL, Python, Java, React.js, React Native, Docker, Serverless framework, etc.
Roles and Responsibilities • Work closely with the Business users to gather and analyze requirement • Design and develop system workflow and architecture • Micro services development via Lambda Serverless RESTful API • R&D of POCs for Front-end, Back-end, and React Native mobile application • Use DevOps tools like Git, Jira, Slack, and Docker for version control and deployment • Code review, mentor, and manage team members

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 54% of this job

PositionHistory.Title: Technical support and maintenance of the existing system
PositionHistory.Description:
Hyderabad Project Description FindBuyers is a SaaS-based real-estate price estimation tool for properties across various cities and states in the US. It collects, process, and represents data from 40+ services and serves it to its elite clients like Berkshire Hathaway, Fox & Roach, Crye-Leike, etc.
Technologies AWS EC2, S3, PHP, CodeIgniter, MySQL, Google Maps, Zillow, RETS, MLS, FB Pixel, etc Roles and Responsibilities • Technical support and maintenance of the existing system • Develop new features and integrate new service providers via API • Customize map and data representation
Project #4: House Joy - Home service-based eCommerce (housejoy.in)
Client Name/Company HouseJoy An Amazon funded company (India)

via Smart Contents - An LMS (creati.st)

Technologies Azure Cloud VM, SSH, PHP CodeIgniter, MongoDB, Angular.js, Bootstrap, Spring Boot, etc. Roles and Responsibilities • Customize existing features, UI/UX, and workflow changes • Develop new features like YouTube integration and activities configuration • Optimize smart contents like Text, Poll, Multiple choice, Video, and PDF • Develop new statistical reports and graphs • Work on new version to support RESTful API architecture using Spring boot

Technologies AWS EC2, Java Spring, Hibernate, MySQL, PHP, Laravel, Bootstrap, jQuery, Grunt, Git, etc. Roles and Responsibilities • Single point of contact for the Bangalore development center • Develop Leads management module for their existing CRM system • Work on both back-end and front-end along with the team members • Travel on-site to the Bangalore development center during production release

PositionHistory.Description:
Project #6: Smart Factory Industrial Machine Automation - IoT/IIoT
Client Name/Company Mahindra & Mahindra, Star Circlips, and SysLogyx (India) Duration and Team Size From October 2015 to November 2016 (10+ months with 9 team members) Development Center Vyako Technologies, Nagpur Project Description Smart factory is all-in-one Internet of Things (IoT) product powered by a customized hardware and software that enables to automate and manage industrial processes like JH, production monitoring, sensors / signals tracking, machine controlling, etc.
Technologies Android, Bootstrap, jQuery, CakePHP, MySQL, Java Spring, Hibernate, etc Roles and Responsibilities • On-site visit with the team to understand the Industrial machine operations • Software design and development by syncing with the Embedded/hardware team • Manual testing of the entire system and deployment on the client side • Manage team members from front-end, back-end, Android, and QA
Project #7: School Bus Tracking & Surveillance System - IoT Client Name/Company Grover Infotech (India)

PositionHistory.Title: Admin
PositionHistory.Description:
Client Name/Company Hyundai Glovis (Australia) Duration and Team Size From October 2015 to July 2016 (10 months with 6 team members) Development Center Vyako Technologies, Nagpur Project Description DCC is a fleet management and consignment tracking system. The drivers are assigned a truck and multiple jobs on daily basis. Admin/Drivers/Customers have their user portals.
Technologies Java Spring, Hibernate, Bootstrap, jQuery, Ionic framework, Android, iPhone, etc Roles and Responsibilities • Mentor and manage team members • Direct point of contact to the client • Customize/develop features for front-end, back-end, and Ionic mobile app

PositionHistory.Title: Mentor and manage front-end, back-end, and Android team members
PositionHistory.Description:
Nagpur Project Description SBTSS is a Internet of Things (IoT) based product that utilizes GPS, Sensors, IP Camera, Speakers, Panic Buttons, Control room, etc. to provide a safety and security solution.
Technologies Android, Luxand Face SDK, GPS, Wi-Fi, BLE, iPhone, JSP, CodeIgniter, MySQL, etc. Roles and Responsibilities • R&D for biometric facial attendance, GPS tracking, and IoT integration • Design and develop RESTful APIs • Mentor and manage front-end, back-end, and Android team members • Real-time testing of the entire system in a school bus with students [beta testing] • Involved in on-site product demonstration to Hon. Nitin Gadkari (Transport Minister)
Project #8: Appoint Expert - Virtual Healthcare Consultation Client Name/Company Appoint Expert (India/USA/South Africa) Duration and Team Size 18+ months with 4 team members Development Center SRS Infosystems, Nagpur Project Description Appoint expert is a virtual assistance/consultation platform basically for healthcare for doctors and patients. But later the platform was open for any type of virtual assistance with support of Text, Audio, Video calls, Images/Video sharing, etc.
Technologies CakePHP, MySQL, FFMPEG, Cloudinary, Exif, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Android, iPhone, PubNub Roles and Responsibilities • Design and develop RESTful back-end services using CakePHP • R&D for POCs related to image/video orientation issues • Mentor team members working on Android and iPhone (native + hybrid)
Project #9: Booking Engine - ERP Client Name/Company Televakt (Norway) Duration and Team Size 36+ months Development Center SRS Infosystems, Nagpur Project Description Booking engine is a SaaS-based ERP solution for their primary partners like Egoria Online Services and Comsoft. It's basically a bi-lingual ERP system that supports English and Norwegian language for the agents, customers, partners, and vendors.
Technologies PHP MVC, MySQL, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, Smarty, Zend framework Roles and Responsibilities • Junior developer • Developed several modules like customers, orders, invoices, and subscriptions • Worked on agent panel with integration of the PBX machine APIs for calls
Project #10: Few more other projects
Development Center SRS Infosystems, Nagpur Project Description • ShareAFlash.com: Social Networking site like Instagram • JumpDates.com: Online dating site • Zoho.com: Zoho products integration with Xero, KashFlow, Economics, etc. • Twitter.com: Real-Time twitter analytics tool with intuitive infographics • Wordpress: 20+ Wordpress application development and customization
Technologies PHP, MySQL, HTML, CSS, jQuery, Android, Ruby on Rails, SQL Server, etc Roles and Responsibilities • Develop Wordpress themes and plugins • Develop POCs in Android and Ionic framework • R&D latest technologies/frameworks

JobCategory.Comments: Information Technology describes 58% of this job

NonXMLResume.TextResume:
MOHIT ASHOK KALE asst. project manager technical lead
Mobile: +91 9766914574, 8856051511 Email ID: mr.mohit44@gmail.com Skype ID: mohit.kale44 Current Location: Nagpur
PROFILE SUMMARY
• Seasoned IT professional with 10 years of comprehensive Technical, Managerial, and Business skill sets • Hands-on experience as an Individual contributor / full-stack developer (60-80%) and 20-40% as a Techno Manager • Expertise in Cloud apps, Agile, Scrum, Project Estimation/Budgeting, and SaaS (Software as a Service) development • Managed teams with more than 20 members from cross-platforms viz. front-end, back-end, Android, iPhone, QA, etc • Worked for both, the Product based and Outsourcing companies on multiple technology stacks/frameworks • Highly skilled in R&D (any technology/framework), Full Stack Development, Manual Testing, POCs, and MVPs • Practical exposure to Hybrid Mobile apps development, and IoT/IIoT software integration/development • Managed multiple clients, projects, teams and Single point of Contact for clients from USA, UK, Australia, Canada, etc. • Experience of reporting to and working closely with the higher management and directors • Proficient problem-solver who envisions business and technical perspectives to develop workable solutions • Technical Architect and active member of the entire SDLC life cycle processes • Perform code review, version control, deployment; recruitment, training; and give post-release support to clients • Organize and conduct technical sessions/seminars on latest technologies and/or project scope • Industries served: Real-estate, Logistics, ERP, eCommerce, eLearning, IoT/IIoT, Healthcare, Social Network, etc.
TECHNICAL SUMMARY
Technologies AWS and Azure Cloud, Node.js, PHP, IoT integration, R&D specialist, Java DevOps Tools Git, GitHub, BitBucket, Jira, Slack, Docker, Travis CI, Jenkins, etc. Databases (SQL/NoSQL) MySQL, MongoDB, DynamoDB, PostgreSQL, MS-SQL Server, and SQLite AWS cloud services IAM, EC2, EBS, Lambda, Cognito, API Gateway, RDS, VPC, CloudFormation, S3, SNS, SQS, etc Frameworks/CMS tools Serverless, Laravel, CodeIgniter, Wordpress, Zend, Spring, Spring Boot, Hibernate, etc Web services/APIs Micro-services, SOA, Swagger API, REST APIs, OAuth 2.0, SAML/SSO, LDAP, SOAP, Curl, SSH Web technologies JSON, XML, YAML, Bootstrap, jQuery, CSS, AJAX, JavaScript, Angular, React, Ionic Third-party APIs Data Scraping/Extraction (ETL), Facebook, Twitter, Google Map, ESRI Maps, etc Payment Gateways Stripe, PayPal, PayZippy, Authorize.net, ccAvenue, etc Mobility development Android, Ionic, React Native, Luxand Face SDK Biometrics, GPS, Play Store deployment, etc Enterprise software Zoho One, Xero, KashFlow, ERP, Logistics, Health Care, Real Estate, etc Servers/IDEs LAMP, Tomcat, Apache, Windows, Ubuntu, VS Code, STS, Eclipse, Android Studio
WORK EXPERIENCE
• Working as a Technical Lead Asst. Project Manager at Doyen Solutions (New address: 7C, Melange Towers, Hi-Tech City, Hyderabad) from Dec' 2016 to Jun' 2019 • Worked as a Asst. Project Manager at Vyako Technologies Pvt. Ltd., Nagpur from Oct' 2015 to Nov' 2016 • Worked as a Team Lead Asst. Project Manager at Grover InfoTech Pvt. Ltd., Nagpur from Sep' 2014 to Oct' 2015 • Worked as a Team Lead at SRS Infosystems Pvt. Ltd., Nagpur from July' 2010 to Sep' 2014 • Worked as a Freelancer (Wordpress, online affiliate, PPC, local projects, etc) from June 2009 to July 2010

sov:Findings.sov:Information: [Sovren:311;] The resume contains a contact information section that is not the first section. A resume should always include the candidate's contact info at the top of the resume.
[Sovren:323;WORK HISTORY] The following section type appeared multiple times in the resume: WORK HISTORY (2 occurrences). Each section type should only appear once in a resume.
[Sovren:221;POS-7,POS-9,POS-11] We could not find a job title for: POS-7, POS-9, POS-11. Every position in a resume should have a job title.
[Sovren:222;POS-5] No employer name was found for: POS-5. Every position in a resume should have an employer name.
[Sovren:231;DEG-3] The following educational degree does not have a degree name: DEG-3. Every degree in a resume should have a name or type associated with it, such as 'B.S.' or 'M.S.'.
[Sovren:232;DEG-4] The following educational degree is not associated with a school: DEG-4. Every degree in a resume should be associated with a school.
[Sovren:133;] Multiple phone numbers were found in the contact information. Only one phone number should be included in a resume.
[Sovren:161;DEG-4] High school (or lower) education should not be included on resumes that contain higher-level education.

sov:ResumeUserArea.sov:ParserConfigurationString: Coverage.MilitaryHistoryAndSecurityCredentials = True; Coverage.PatentsPublicationsAndSpeakingEvents = True; Coverage.PersonalAttributes = True; Coverage.Training = True; Culture.CountryCodeForUnitedKingdomIsUK = True; Culture.DefaultCountryCode = IN; Culture.DefaultCultureIsIndia = True; Culture.Language = English; Culture.PreferEnglishVersionIfTwoLanguagesInDocument = False; Data.UserDefinedParsing = False; OutputFormat.AssumeCompanyNameFromPrecedingJob = False; OutputFormat.ContactMethod.PackStyle = Split; OutputFormat.DateOutputStyle = ExplicitlyKnownDateInfoOnly; OutputFormat.NestJobsBasedOnDateRanges = True; OutputFormat.NormalizeRegions = False; OutputFormat.SkillsStyle = Default; OutputFormat.StripParsedDataFromPositionHistoryDescription = True; OutputFormat.TelcomNumber.Style = Raw; OutputFormat.XmlFormat = HrXmlResume25
